thread.title: NYPD: 2 arrested after Siberian Husky puppy stolen in Bronx
thread.title_full: NYPD: 2 arrested after Siberian Husky puppy stolen in Bronx - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: NYPD: 2 arrested after Siberian Husky puppy stolen in Bronx
text:
NEW YORK (AP) - New York City police say two people have been arrested after a Siberian Husky puppy was stolen from an apartment in the Bronx.
Authorities say 21-year-old Collin Small and a 15-year-old boy were arrested Friday on misdemeanor stolen property charges. It was not immediately clear whether they had attorneys who could comment.
Police say the charges relate to a burglary that happened Tuesday.
Investigators say a man returned to his Bronx apartment and found the home ransacked and his female puppy named "Luna" was gone.
Police say more than $1,000 in cash, several pairs of sneakers and a video game console were also taken.
The Daily News of New York reports ( http://nydn.us/1kbj3pq ) the two were arrested after contacting the dog's owner, looking for a reward if they returned the pup.
Information from: Daily News, http://www.nydailynews.com
